PlanetScoreFormula.Formula: ((Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, PlanetFood) * 5.0) + (Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, PlanetIndustry) * 2.0) + (Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, PlanetDust) * 1.5) + (Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, PlanetScience) * 1.5) + Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, PlanetPrestige)) / (11.0 * (Max(1, Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, Population)))) + Property(Planet, @ClassPlanet, ParasitedPopulation) * 5
